summary:
##  Reliability, Updates & Startup Safety

###  Script & Repair Hardening
- Fixed Scoop root detection crash (undefined `$trimmed`, path normalization, stray logs removed)
- Added guarded DISM retry: falls back from `/LimitAccess` to Windows Update on known source failures
- Missing automation scripts no longer crash Performance Lab -> returns guided error instead
- Fixed ram-purge bootstrap parse errors by restoring module-path resolution

###  Installer & Updater Reliability
- Installer now **cleans old app files** before copy to avoid stale binaries
- In-app updater:
  - Prompts before install
  - Runs installer UI with safe replace flags
  - Closes/restarts app to avoid file locks
  - Extends cleanup delay to avoid mid-run deletion

###  Splash & Startup UX
- Splash window redesigned:
  - Fixed medium size (960×540), centered, owned by main window
  - No separate Alt+Tab entry
  - Subtle gradient + vignette (no blur)
  - Adaptive animation based on render tier
  - Reduced shadow blur + bitmap caching for lower GPU cost

---

##  Startup Safety (Major Upgrade)

- Introduced **StartupSafetyClassifier** (centralized, cached, production-grade):
  - Detects **system-critical** items (Windows paths, Microsoft security, drivers, core services/tasks)
  - Determines **safe-to-disable** items conservatively
- Removed inline heuristics; all logic routed through the classifier
- Added **“Are you absolutely sure?”** confirmation when disabling system-critical entries
- Each startup entry now computes `IsSystemCritical` and shows a **shield “System” badge**
- Added **System filter toggle** to isolate OS / driver / security items
- Improved robustness with rule sets, caching (TTL), path normalization, vendor checks

_Not system-critical examples (no badge, no hard warning):_
- Third-party services under Program Files

---

##  PathPilot & UI Polish
- Made PathPilot runtime list lighter and scrollable
- Removed heavy outer ScrollViewer/margin logic
- Improved virtualization and responsiveness
